mapper.insert: insert into pcm_promotion_rate_product (sid, shoppe_pro_sid, promotion_rate_code_sid, begin_time, end_time, create_time, opt_user_sid) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{promotionRateCodeSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update pcm_promotion_rate_product
shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
promotion_rate_code_sid = #{promotionRateCodeSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opt_user_sid = #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pcm_promotion_rate_product set shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, promotion_rate_code_sid = #{promotionRateCodeSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opt_user_sid = #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ssc.promo_sale_code from pcm_promotion_rate_product prp join pcm_supply_shop_code ssc on prp.promotion_rate_code_sid=ssc.sid where shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and now() between prp.begin_time and prp.end_time
